mcq.statement: Where was Bahadur Shah Zafar exiled after the War of Independence, 1857?
mcq.one_liner: After the War of Independence in 1857, Bahadur Shah Zafar was exiled to **Rangoon in British-controlled Burma (now Myanmar)**.
